title: freeCodeCamp - Back End Development and APIs

description.summary: Completed a curriculum focused on backend development with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, emphasizing REST-style APIs and microservices. Gained experience with server-side logic, middleware, and data persistence using Mongoose. Applied skills by building and deploying multiple backend projects.
points: Learned Node.js fundamentals, npm workflows, and Express routing/middleware
Designed and documented RESTful APIs and JSON microservices
Implemented CRUD operations and schema modeling with MongoDB/Mongoose
Completed five backend projects: Timestamp Microservice, Request Header Parser, URL Shortener, Exercise Tracker, and File Metadata Microservice

description.summary: Gained hands-on experience with supervised learning, model evaluation, feature engineering, and scikit-learn tools to build and improve predictive models.

Gained hands-on experience visualizing data with Seaborn, including bar plots, histograms, box plots, heatmaps, and scatter plots; applied best practices for exploring distributions, relationships, and categorical data in Python.
Demonstrated proficiency in data analysis using the pandas library in Python, including DataFrame manipulation, data cleaning, aggregation, merging, and time series analysis.
Learned core concepts of NoSQL databases and MongoDB's document-oriented model.
points: Performed CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) using the MongoDB Shell and Compass
Learned schema design principles for flexible, scalable data models
Queried data using advanced filter conditions, projections, and sorting
Utilized indexes to improve performance and analyzed explain plans
Connected to MongoDB Atlas clusters and configured cloud-based deployments
Explored aggregation pipelines for data transformation and computation
